          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Einheiten</string>

            <string language="en">This illustration shows some examples of electrical devices which are made up of electric circuits.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre quelques exemples des

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra alguns exemplos de
